channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Aletiq secures $6.5M for its SaaS tool focused on product lifecycle management

item.title: Best MacBooks (2025): Which Apple Laptop Should You Buy?
item.description: Having a hard time choosing from Apple’s complex MacBook lineup? Let us help you find the right laptop.

item.title: Adidas Promo Codes & Deals: Up to 50% Off in March 2025
item.description: Save up to 50% at the Adidas Spring Sale and join the adiClub to enjoy great benefits, like 15% off, plus other member-exclusive deals.

item.title: NordVPN Coupon and Discount Codes: 77% Off
item.description: Save up to 77% on 2-year plans and get 3 free months with our NordVPN discount codes.

item.title: Top KitchenAid Promo Codes and Coupons
item.description: Get 50% off select appliances, 15% off most regular-price items, free delivery, and other great savings today on WIRED.

item.title: Roku Tests Showing Ads Before the Home Screen Loads
